title: Wear File Explorer
summary: This is a file explorer for your android wear. More features will come soon
description: The ultimate goal of this app is to build a music player for android wear. The first step is the ability to sync file from your phone to the watch easily and select the music you want to play. Therefore, this app is built. You can also use the explorer to browse your files on the watch.This app supports  1. File exploring on the watchTo use it:  1. Install the app and make sure it's sync to your android wear device  2. Open it and enjoy it;)Notes:  1. This is the first release of the watch. More features will come later, so stay tuned.  2. I am a part time developer so your suggestions are welcome.
descriptionHTML:
The ultimate goal of this app is to build a music player for android wear. The first step is the ability to sync file from your phone to the watch easily and select the music you want to play. Therefore, this app is built. You can also use the explorer to browse your files on the watch.

This app supports
1. File exploring on the watch

To use it:
1. Install the app and make sure it's sync to your android wear device
2. Open it and enjoy it;)

Notes:
1. This is the first release of the watch. More features will come later, so stay tuned.
2. I am a part time developer so your suggestions are welcome.
comments: Awesome File Explorer for Wear! Thank you so much for this!   It works good so far, it's really nice to have the file explorer ability right on my Gear Live,  this watch keeps getting better and better, a lot due to developers like you, I am looking forward to the music player!  I will edit this with any observations or issues as needed.
Doesn't work! I can't open the SD card on my LG G Watch. Tried un-rooted as well as rooted.
